page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NATALIE
page.content: I woke up to the sound of running water. I got up,washed,dressed and tidied my room and bed. Downstairs I went and had cornflakes for breakfast and then back upstairs to clean my teeth, brush my hair,collect my coat and bag for school. Then into the car for the journey to school. At school the usual kind of day_ assembly,maths and mental test, playtimes etc. For dinner it was meat,cabbage,potatoes and gravy, custard and pie.Afternoon school over and I changed into my jeans,shirt and jumper.A short time playing then it was tea time which was a sandwich,crisps,a drink and an ice pop.After tea I played with Rachel Gibbs and Clair Adams.At 7.30pm I helped Rachel bath her baby sisters and put them to bed.We then played in my house till almost bedtime.I watched television and then I went to bed.
